short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality Modeller uses visual modelling to embed quality throughout every step of software delivery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Quality Modeller Explorer simplifies test automation by eliminating manual scripting and generating reliable page objects effortlessly.

Designed for speed and productivity:

- Quick Setup: Start building page objects and automating repetitive tasks directly in your browser—no coding needed.

- Accelerated Testing: Cut down on time spent manually configuring test cases.

- Reduce Errors: Ensure consistency and accuracy in your test data every time.

Perfect for teams looking to streamline software testing and maximize efficiency without the manual overhead.

About Us
Curiosity redefines software delivery. We empower enterprises to thrive when delivering superior software, overcoming the challenges holding them back – complexity, legacy, and scale.

Building on decades of experience in unblocking enterprise software delivery, our pioneering approach transforms how enterprises deliver software. We align the “inner” and “outer” loops of software delivery, focusing on key productivity blockers: quality and test data.

Our platform empowers your enterprise to achieve unbeatable productivity, unlocking quality and scalability throughout software delivery.

For more information, please visit - https://www.curiositysoftware.ie
